name: proposal
description: Takes a node-style callbacking function and converts it into a Promise automagically

scripts.cc: npm run compile && npm run copydata
scripts.test: npm run cc && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly dist/test/*.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Vinnie Garcia <vinnie@coev.co>
